General.Name: Bank Bumi Arta Tbk
General.Description: PT Bank Bumi Arta Tbk provides banking products and services in Indonesia. The company provides savings, call, and term deposits; and business financing solutions, including account, fixed, demand, housing, car ownership, pension, term, multipurpose, export and import financing, and investment loans. In addition, it offers bank guarantee services; payment services for electricity, telephone, and tax; ATM, and internet and mobile banking services; and other services, such as bank notes, corporate payroll, financial supply chain, and bank drafts. The company operates a network of branches, sub-branches, and ATM machines. PT Bank Bumi Arta Tbk was founded in 1967 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Wahid Hasyim No. 234, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10250
